Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the invertebrate defensin family (Type 1 subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus megaterium (MIC=1.2-2.5 µM), Bacillus subtilis (MIC>40 µM), Micrococcus luteus (MIC=1.2-2.5 µM), Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=2.5-5 µM).Gram-negative bacteria:Enterobacter asbriae (MIC>40 µM), Escherichia coli (MIC>40 µM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa (MIC>40 µM), Serratia marcescens (MIC>40 µM), Xenorhabdus japonicus (MIC>40 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Strong activity against the Gram-positive bacteria M.luteus, B.megaterium and S. aureus. Reduced activity against Gram-positive bacterium B.subtilis and weak activity against Gram-negative bacterium X.japonicus.

Literature.Title: Two novel insect defensins from larvae of the cupreous chafer, Anomala cuprea purification, amino acid sequences and antibacterial activity.
Literature.Author: Yamauchi H.

Literature.Title: Two novel insect defensins from larvae of the cupreous chafer, Anomala cuprea: purification, amino acid sequences and antibacterial activity.
